input: Which one among the following statements regarding the constitutionally guaranteed Right to Education in India is correct?

options.A: This right covers both child and adult illiteracy and therefore, universally guarantees education to all citizens of India
options.B: This right is a child right covering the age group of 6 to 14 years and becomes operational from the year 2015
options.C: This right has been taken from the British Constitution which was the first Welfare State in the world
options.D: This right has been given to all Indian children between the ages of 6 to 14 years under the 86th Constitutional Amendment Act

explanation: The 86th amendment to the Constitution approved in 2002 providing free and compulsory education to all children age 6 to 14 years has been notified. It included Article 21(a) in the Indian constitution making education a fundamental right.
